Key Match Events: Jordyn Adams hit a walk-off single in the 13th inning to win 4-3 for the Los Angeles Angels
Andrew Vaughn hit a home run in the 4th inning for the Chicago White Sox
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Chicago White Sox tied the 1916 Philadelphia Athletics for the third most losses since 1900 with their 117th loss
The White Sox need to go 7-2 in their final nine games to avoid the post-1900 record of 120 losses by the 1962 expansion New York Mets
Others: The game went into extra innings tied at one
Each team scored in the 10th and 11th innings
José Quijada (2-0) struck out Yoán Moncada to end the 13th frame
Halos starter Jack Kochanowicz allowed one run in 5 2/3 innings
